text: Cristiano Dutra Vale (born in Manhuaçu on April 10, 1970) is a Brazilian cattle rancher and politician, affiliated with the Progressive Party. Currently, he holds the position of mayor of the municipality of Viseu in the state of Pará. Previously, he served as a federal deputy for the state of Pará, Brazil. ==References== Category:Brazilian mayors Category:1970 births Category:Living people
title: Cristiano Vale
